title: A US Agency Rejected Face Recognition—and Landed in Big Trouble
description: Officials working on Login.gov, used to access dozens of government sites, worried about algorithmic bias. Their decision breached federal security rules.

title: The TikTok CEO’s Face-Off With Congress Is Doomed
description: On Thursday, Shou Zi Chew will meet a rare united front in the US Congress against the Chinese-owned social media app that has lawmakers in a tizzy.

title: 4 People Tweeting’ Changed the Face of Nigerian Politics
description: A youth-led online movement propelled an outsider candidate into the political mainstream.
